data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dagosta, Fernando Cesar Paiva, Pastana, Murilo Nogueira De Lima (2014): New species of Creagrutus Günther (Characiformes: Characidae) from rio Tapajós basin, Brazil, with comments on its phylogenetic position. Zootaxa 3765 (6): 571-582, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3765.6.5
